meanings.definition: The quality of being like an uncle.
meanings.sent1: His avuncularity shone through as he patiently taught his nephew how to fish.
meanings.sent2: The avuncularity of the man made him a favorite among the neighborhood kids.
meanings.sent3: The avuncularity of the dog towards the kittens was both heartwarming and amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her avuncularity towards her younger colleagues earned her the nickname 'Auntie Mentor'.
meanings.sent5: The avuncularity of the old oak tree provided a sense of comfort and protection to the forest creatures.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics typical of an uncle.
meanings.sent1: His jovial avuncularity always brought a smile to family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated his avuncularity, especially when he shared his wisdom with her.
meanings.sent3: The avuncularity of the robot butler was both endearing and slightly robotic.
meanings.sent4: His avuncularity was like a warm blanket on a cold winter's day.
meanings.sent5: The avuncularity of the librarian made the children feel safe and cared for in the library.

meanings.definition: The relationship between an uncle and his nieces or nephews.
meanings.sent1: Their avuncularity was evident in the way he always had time to play with his nieces and nephews.
meanings.sent2: The bond of avuncularity between them grew stronger with each family gathering.
meanings.sent3: The avuncularity between the coach and his players created a supportive and nurturing team environment.
meanings.sent4: The avuncularity between the firefighter and the children rescued from the burning building was heartwarming.
meanings.sent5: The avuncularity between the elderly neighbor and the young siblings was a source of joy for the whole community.
